right.item:
MSUD gel

A leucine, isoleucine, and valine free drink or gel for use in the dietary management of Maple Syrup Urine Disease (MSUD) in children from 12 months to 10 years of age.

MSUD express

A leucine, isoleucine, and valine free protein substitute for use in the dietary management of Maple Syrup Urine Disease (MSUD) in individuals aged 8 years and older.

MSUD express cooler

A leucine, isoleucine, and valine free protein substitute for use in the dietary management of Maple Syrup Urine Disease (MSUD) in individuals aged 8 years and older.
